name: Dusky Purple Embroidered Tissue Saree
description: Our Dusky Purple Embroidered Tissue Saree includes a viscose tissue zari top with satin inner and a viscose tissue organza saree. Embroidery is present on this style using zari and hand embellishments. Like all of our pieces, this piece is made in India and checked by hand to ensure high quality.

name: Regular Fit Panjabi
description: Crafted from 100% pure cotton, this Panjabi offers breathable comfort with timeless charm. Featuring a mandarin collar and subtle embroidery along the placket with buttonhole detailing, it’s a perfect blend of simplicity and elegance—ideal for warm-weather festivities and everyday sophistication. Note: Final color of the product may vary slightly due to the variation of the light source & the photo device.

name: Regular Fit Panjabi
description: Crafted from 100% cotton, this Panjabi offers both comfort and breathability for all-day wear. The mandarin collar features an inside contrast, adding a refined and modern touch. The printed fabric design is complemented by dark contrast details inside the sleeve and moon, creating a striking balance of traditional style and contemporary flair. Note: Final color of the product may vary slightly due to the variation of the light source & the photo device.

name: Regular Fit Panjabi
description: Made from 100% cotton fabric, this Panjabi offers both comfort and breathability. The mandarin collar features a subtle inside contrast, adding a refined touch. The printed fabric design is complemented by a dark contrast inside the sleeve and moon, creating a striking balance between traditional style and contemporary flair. Note: Final color of the product may vary slightly due to the variation of the light source & the photo device.

name: Limited Edition Ceremonial Panjabi
description: Elegantly tailored in a regular fit, this Black Range Panjabi is crafted from premium blended jacquard fabric. Featuring tonal Zardozi work on the placket and collar band with matched sequins and materials, it exudes understated luxury. Finished with a double placket, dyed-to-match buttonholes, refined buttons, and decorative stitching on the sleeve hem—perfect for timeless festive sophistication. Note: Final color of the product may vary slightly due to the variation of the light source & the photo device.

name: Luxury Jacquard Panjabi
description: This panjabi features a rich jacquard fabric and a sophisticated design, perfect for formal occasions. The detailed weave provides a premium feel and elegant look.

name: Vibrant Casual Panjabi
description: A comfortable and stylish panjabi with a striking color, suitable for everyday wear. Made from high-quality fabric, it offers a great blend of style and ease.

name: Classic Cotton Panjabi
description: This classic cotton panjabi is a wardrobe staple, offering a clean, simple, and elegant look. Its breathable fabric makes it perfect for warm weather.

name: Patterned Modern Panjabi
description: This piece features a subtle yet modern pattern that adds a unique touch to its simple design. It is ideal for those who prefer understated elegance.

name: Traditional Embroidered Panjabi
description: A beautifully embroidered panjabi that combines traditional craftsmanship with a contemporary fit. The intricate detailing makes it a standout piece for any festival or celebration.

name: Lightweight Printed Panjabi
description: Perfect for casual outings, this lightweight panjabi features a soft print. The material is comfortable and breathable, making it suitable for everyday use.

name: Modern Cut Panjabi
description: This panjabi has a sleek, modern cut that provides a sharp, tailored silhouette. Its clean design and rich color make it a versatile choice for a variety of events.

name: Elegant Semi-Formal Panjabi
description: A semi-formal panjabi with a subtle sheen, designed for comfort and style. The minimalist design allows it to be dressed up or down depending on the occasion.

name: Solid Color Panjabi
description: A timeless solid-color panjabi that is a must-have for any collection. Its classic design ensures it never goes out of style and can be paired with anything.

name: Soft Texture Panjabi
description: This panjabi is made from a soft-textured fabric, providing a comfortable and relaxed fit. The muted color adds to its understated and sophisticated appeal.

name: Contemporary Floral Panjabi
description: A contemporary panjabi with a subtle floral pattern, combining modern design with traditional motifs. It is perfect for adding a touch of flair to your wardrobe.

name: Formal Occasion Panjabi
description: Designed for formal events, this panjabi has a clean, structured look and a rich color. Its minimalist aesthetic makes it a timeless addition to your collection.

name: Casual Printed Panjabi
description: A comfortable and casual panjabi with a simple print, perfect for daily wear. The lightweight fabric ensures you stay comfortable all day long.

name: Classic Black Panjabi
description: A classic black panjabi with a simple, elegant design that is perfect for any occasion. The versatile color and timeless style make it a must-have.

name: Subtle Pattern Panjabi
description: This panjabi features a subtle, self-woven pattern that adds texture and depth to its look. It’s an understated yet sophisticated choice.

name: Elegance Embroidered Net Saree
description: This stunning net saree is intricately embroidered with delicate thread work, creating a beautiful and ethereal look. It's a perfect choice for weddings and grand events.

name: Crimson Silk Saree
description: A classic crimson silk saree with a minimalist design, offering a timeless and elegant appeal. The rich color and smooth texture make it a versatile piece for any festive occasion.

name: Peacock Blue Brocade Saree
description: This brocade saree features a vibrant peacock blue hue with intricate woven patterns. The luxurious fabric drapes beautifully, making it a sophisticated choice for formal events.

name: Golden Zari Work Saree
description: An exquisite saree with shimmering golden zari work and a delicate border. The lightweight material ensures comfort while the elaborate design makes it a festive favorite.

name: Floral Embroidered Organza Saree
description: This organza saree is adorned with elegant floral embroidery, giving it a fresh and modern look. Its sheer fabric is perfect for creating a graceful silhouette.

name: Pastel Pink and Gold Saree
description: A beautiful pastel pink saree with gold embellishments, offering a soft and sophisticated aesthetic. It's a versatile piece that can be worn for both daytime and evening events.

name: Ruby Red Sequined Saree
description: This stunning ruby red saree is fully covered in sequins, ensuring you stand out at any party. Its sparkling design is perfect for those who want a glamorous look.

name: Turquoise Designer Saree
description: A unique designer saree in a vibrant turquoise color with intricate detailing along the border. This piece is a blend of traditional style and contemporary fashion.

name: Royal Blue and Silver Saree
description: This royal blue saree is complemented by elegant silver work, creating a majestic and regal appearance. The luxurious fabric makes it comfortable to wear for long hours.

name: Minimalist White and Gold Saree
description: A minimalist white saree with a thin gold border, perfect for those who appreciate simplicity and sophistication. It's a timeless piece that exudes grace.

name: Pastel Embroidered Chiffon Saree
description: This chiffon saree is a light and flowy piece, featuring delicate pastel embroidery. It's perfect for a day event where comfort and elegance are key.

name: Deep Red Heavy Work Saree
description: A stunning deep red saree with heavy embroidery and a rich border. The intricate details make it an ideal outfit for bridal and festive occasions.
